Title: Python Programming
Content: Make your entrance into the wonderful world of programming with Python!

Title: Object-Oriented Programming
Content: You will learn Object-oriented programming (OOP) that is a method of structuring a program by bundling related properties and behaviors into individual objects.

Title: GUI Programming
Content: Combine your Python programming knowledge with your GUI design by using PYQT-5

Title: Database
Content: You will learn to store data securely and use it whenever you want. (SQL/ NonSQL)

Title: Web Scraping, HTTP Request and API's
Content: You will learn to scrape information from the internet and use this information (Beautiful Soup, Selenium, Scrapy)

Title: Statistics for Data Science
Content: You will earn the basic statistical information to use when processing data.

Title: Exploring Data
Content: You will learn about Exploratory Data Analysis or (EDA) that is understanding the data sets by summarizing their main characteristics often plotting them visually.(NumP, Pandas)

Title: Data Visualization
Content: You will learn about Data Visualization that plays an essential role in the representation of both small and large-scale data.(Matplotlib, Plotly, Seaborn)

Title: Machine Learning
Content: Get the key element of Supervised and Unsupervised learning.

Title: NLP and Recomendation Systems
Content: Learn Recommender systems (RS) that have evolved into a fundamental tool for helping users make informed decisions and choices.

Title: Data Science Project
Content: Let's bring it all together: combine your forces to build a data science project!

Title: GRADUATION
Content: Collect your certification to became data scientist!
